gender.title: Gender
gender.$comment: As this can change, a decision needs to be made to either: 1) Overwrite the 'Person' level attribute with updated information, or 2) create an array object that tracks the changes, or 3) record it only at the lower level entities (like Applicant, Student, Staff etc).
